snippet: If confirmed, four of the five commissioners will be women for the first time, and one would be only the third African-American commissioner in the history of the agency.
abstract: President Obama nominates Lisa M Fairfax as commissioner of Securities and Exchange Commission and Hester Maria Peirce to fill Republican vacancy on commission; if both nominations are confirmed, group that makes up SEC commissioners will be most diverse ever.
lead_paragraph: If confirmed, four of the five commissioners will be women for the first time, and one would be only the third African-American commissioner in the history of the agency.

headline.print_headline: The Most Diverse S.E.C. Ever May Be Taking Shape
headline.main: The Most Diverse S.E.C. Ever May Be Taking Shape
